statements: SELECT * FROM FoundationGrant WHERE grant_amount > 1000 ORDER BY grant_date DESC;
SELECT recipient_name, grant_amount FROM FoundationGrant WHERE grant_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM FoundationGrant WHERE recipient_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT recipient_name, grant_amount FROM FoundationGrant WHERE grant_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT grant_id, recipient_name, grant_amount, grant_date FROM FoundationGrant WHERE grant_amount < 500 ORDER BY recipient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM FoundationGrant WHERE grant_amount > 5000 AND grant_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT grant_id, recipient_name, grant_amount FROM FoundationGrant WHERE recipient_name LIKE '%Foundation%' ORDER BY grant_amount DESC
SELECT recipient_name, COUNT(*) AS grants_count FROM FoundationGrant GROUP BY recipient_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 2
SELECT recipient_name, SUM(grant_amount) AS total_grant_amount FROM FoundationGrant GROUP BY recipient_name HAVING total_grant_amount > 10000 ORDER BY total_grant_amount DESC
SELECT grant_id, recipient_name, grant_date FROM FoundationGrant WHERE recipient_name = 'ABC Foundation' AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM grant_date) = 12 ORDER BY grant_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM grants
SELECT grant_id, grant_recipient FROM grants WHERE grant_amount > 10000
SELECT grant_recipient, grant_amount FROM grants ORDER BY grant_amount DESC
SELECT donor_name, donor_location FROM donors WHERE donor_location = 'New York'
SELECT * FROM grants WHERE grant_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT grant_recipient, grant_amount FROM grants ORDER BY grant_date DESC, grant_amount ASC;
SELECT donor_name, donor_location FROM donors WHERE donor_location='New York';
SELECT * FROM grants WHERE grant_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT donor_name, SUM(grant_amount) AS total_amount_donated FROM donors JOIN grants ON donor_id = grant_id GROUP BY donor_name ORDER BY total_amount_donated DESC;
SELECT AVG(grant_amount) AS avg_grant_amount, COUNT(*) AS total_grants FROM grants WHERE grant_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM grants ORDER BY grant_date DESC;
SELECT grant_id, grant_amount, recipient_organization FROM grants WHERE grant_amount > 10000;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_method FROM donors WHERE donation_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT funder_name, funding_amount FROM funders WHERE funding_amount >= 50000 ORDER BY funding_date;
SELECT * FROM grants INNER JOIN donors ON grants.grant_amount = donors.donation_amount;
SELECT * FROM grants WHERE grant_amount > 10000 ORDER BY grant_date DESC
SELECT grant_id, grant_date, recipient_organization FROM grants WHERE recipient_organization LIKE 'ABC%'
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donors WHERE donation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT funder_name, funding_date, funding_purpose FROM funders WHERE funding_amount < 5000 ORDER BY funding_date ASC
SELECT grant_id, grant_amount, purpose FROM grants WHERE grant_date >= '2022-06-01' AND grant_date <= '2022-06-30'
SELECT grant_name, amount FROM grants;
SELECT recipient_id, recipient_name, total_grants_received FROM recipients;
SELECT program_name, program_type FROM programs WHERE program_type = 'Education';
SELECT category_name, category_description FROM grant_categories ORDER BY total_grants_given DESC;
SELECT * FROM grants WHERE grant_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT grant_name, amount FROM grants WHERE grant_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM recipients WHERE total_grants_received > 5000 ORDER BY recipient_name DESC;
SELECT program_name, program_type FROM programs WHERE program_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND program_type = 'Scholarship' ORDER BY program_name ASC;
SELECT category_name, total_grants_given, category_description FROM grant_categories WHERE total_grants_given > 10000;
SELECT recipient_name, location FROM recipients WHERE location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY recipient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM grants;
SELECT grant_id, grant_amount FROM grants WHERE grant_amount > 1000;
SELECT grant_date, recipient_organization FROM grants WHERE grant_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM grant_recipients WHERE recipient_location = 'New York';
SELECT funder_id, funder_name FROM grant_funders ORDER BY funder_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM grants ORDER BY grant_amount DESC;
SELECT grant_id, grant_date FROM grants WHERE grant_amount > 10000;
SELECT grant_id, recipient_organization FROM grants WHERE grant_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT gr.grant_id, gr.grant_amount, gc.category_name FROM grants gr JOIN grant_category gc ON gr.grant_id = gc.category_id;
SELECT gf.funder_name, gr.recipient_name, gr.recipient_location FROM grant_funders gf JOIN grant_relationships gr ON gf.funder_id = gr.funder_id;
